term.title: photochemical smog

item.text: Product of photochemical reactions caused by solar radiation and occurring in polluted air as well as in air contaminated by compounds emitted by natural sources, such as those emitted by vegetation.

sources.item: PAC, 2007, 79, 293. 'Glossary of terms used in photochemistry, 3rd edition (IUPAC Recommendations 2006)' on page 386 (https://doi.org/10.1351/pac200779030293)
